ImyaTweaks.Title: Change the Supply Range of all Palace Gastronomy Buildings.
ImyaTweaks.Description: You can Increase or Decrease the Ranges of all Gastronomy Buildings on Land and Water

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Custom ProductionBuffDistance for all Palace Gastronomy Buildings
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the ProductionBuffDistance for all Palace Gastronomy Buildings ( Mod default settings = 45 )
